title: SceneMediaOptionsConfig
description: The options of a media object. An instance of a scene media options object.

autoPlay.title: Autoplay
autoPlay.description: Does the video need to be played automatically at start ?

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Does the video need to be looped automatically at the end of playing ?

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: Set the current position (in seconds) of the video playback.
